sentences.en: ...the towering marble archway that marked the entry to the Pelican Point development.
sentences.cn: …标志着鹈鹕顶开发区入口的、高耸的大理石拱门。

sentences.en: a dictionary entry
sentences.cn: 词典的条目

sentences.en: A pushed-in window indicated unlawful entry.
sentences.cn: 往里推开的窗户表明有人非法入内。

sentences.en: All entrants must warrant that their entry is entirely their own work.
sentences.cn: 所有参赛者必须保证其参赛作品完全是自己创作的。

sentences.en: Any entry arriving after the closing date will not be considered.
sentences.cn: 截止日期之后报名参赛的人将不予考虑。

sentences.en: Entry to this competition is by invitation only.
sentences.cn: 只有受邀请才能参加本次竞赛。

sentences.en: Entry to this prize draw is limited to UK residents.
sentences.cn: 这次抽奖只限英国公民参加。

sentences.en: He made a triumphal entry into the city.
sentences.cn: 他以胜利者之姿进入了那座城市。

sentences.en: He made his triumphal entry into Mexico City.
sentences.cn: 他以胜利者的姿态进入墨西哥城。

sentences.en: How did the thieves gain entry (= get in )?
sentences.cn: 窃贼是怎样进入的？

sentences.en: Many entry-level jobs were filled by school leavers.
sentences.cn: 很多初级水平工作都由中学毕业生来做。

sentences.en: More keyboarding staff are required for data entry.
sentences.cn: 需要更多的键盘录入人员来录入这些资料。

sentences.en: Only accredited journalists were allowed entry.
sentences.cn: 只有正式认可的记者才获准入内。

sentences.en: Out of the original 23,000 applications, 16,000 candidates meet the entry requirements.
sentences.cn: 最初的2.3万份申请中有1.6万份满足入选的要求。

sentences.en: She made her entry to the sound of thunderous applause.
sentences.cn: 她在雷鸣般的掌声中上了场。

sentences.en: The house has been barred and bolted to prevent re-entry.
sentences.cn: 房子已经被封了，门被闩上，防止有人入内。

sentences.en: The point of entry into Zambia would be the Chirundu border post.
sentences.cn: 想要进入赞比亚应该经由奇龙杜边防哨所。

sentences.en: The police checked all windows and doors for signs of forcible entry.
sentences.cn: 警察检查了所有的门窗以寻找强行闯入的痕迹。

sentences.en: The station would burn up on re-entry into the earth's atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 空间站在重返地球大气层时会被烧毁。

sentences.en: There was no sign of a forced entry.
sentences.cn: 没有强行闯入的迹象。

sentences.en: You can leave your umbrella in the entry.
sentences.cn: 你可以把伞放在入口处。

phrases.tran_cn: n. 货物的进口港；人员的入境港；报关港

trans.tran_cn: 进入（许可），入口，参加，条目，事项，参赛作品，输入
trans.tran_en: the act of going into something
